Module hash

  • Functions

ink_core::env

?

[−][src]Module ink_core::env::hash

Built-in efficient cryptographic hash functions.

Functions

blake2_128

Conducts the BLAKE2 128-bit hash of the given bytes and puts the result into the output buffer.

blake2_256

Conducts the BLAKE2 256-bit hash of the given bytes and puts the result into the output buffer.

keccak_256

Conducts the KECCAK 256-bit hash of the given bytes and puts the result into the output buffer.

sha2_256

Conducts the SHA2 256-bit hash of the given bytes and puts the result into the output buffer.
